v-model:active.description: The active tab identifier matches name first, followed by index
v-model:active.description_zh: The active tab identifier matches name first, followed by index

layout-direction.description: The layout direction of the tabs, optional value of horizontal vertical
layout-direction.description_zh: The layout direction of the tabs, optional value of horizontal vertical

item-direction.description: The layout direction of the tab, optional value of horizontal vertical
item-direction.description_zh: The layout direction of the tab, optional value of horizontal vertical

fixed-bottom.description: Whether fixed to the bottom of the window, can be used for bottom navigation
fixed-bottom.description_zh: Whether fixed to the bottom of the window, can be used for bottom navigation

color.description: The background color of the tabs
color.description_zh: The background color of the tabs

active-color.description: The primary color that the tab is activates
active-color.description_zh: The primary color that the tab is activates

inactive-color.description: The primary color that the tab is not activated
inactive-color.description_zh: The primary color that the tab is not activated

disabled-color.description: The primary color that the tab is disabled
disabled-color.description_zh: The primary color that the tab is disabled

indicator-color.description: The tab activates the color of the indicator
indicator-color.description_zh: The tab activates the color of the indicator

indicator-size.description: Tab activates the size of the indicator
indicator-size.description_zh: Tab activates the size of the indicator

elevation.description: Elevation level, options true false and level of 0-24
elevation.description_zh: Elevation level, options true false and level of 0-24

sticky-css-mode.description: Whether to enable sticky layouts native css sticky mode
sticky-css-mode.description_zh: Whether to enable sticky layouts native css sticky mode

safe-area.description: Whether to enable bottom safe area adaptation
safe-area.description_zh: Whether to enable bottom safe area adaptation

scrollable.description: Whether to enable scrollable, optional value of auto always
scrollable.description_zh: Whether to enable scrollable, optional value of auto always

indicator-position.description: The position of the indicator, optional value of normal reverse
indicator-position.description_zh: The position of the indicator, optional value of normal reverse

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when the tab is clicked, but not when the tab disabled status is true
events.description_zh: Triggered when the tab is clicked, but not when the tab disabled status is true
